statements: SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate >= 3.5;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01' AND end_date >= '2022-08-01';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks FROM campaign_performance WHERE clicks > 100
SELECT user_id, conversion_value FROM conversion_rates ORDER BY conversion_value DESC
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE campaign_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, conversion_datetime FROM conversion_rates WHERE user_id = 3 AND campaign_id = 5
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, conversion_datetime, conversion_value FROM conversion_rates WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY impressions DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, conversion_datetime, conversion_value FROM conversion_rates WHERE campaign_id = 5 ORDER BY conversion_datetime DESC
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, conversion_datetime, conversion_value FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_value >= 50 ORDER BY conversion_value ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_date, conversion_rate FROM conversion_rates
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_time FROM conversion_rates ORDER BY conversion_time DESC
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT user_id, email FROM users
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC
SELECT u.username, u.email, cr.conversion_rate FROM users u JOIN conversion_rates cr ON u.user_id = cr.campaign_id WHERE cr.conversion_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT campaign_name, budget, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY campaign_end_date ASC
SELECT cr.conversion_date, cr.conversion_time, cr.conversion_rate, c.campaign_name FROM conversion_rates cr JOIN campaigns c ON cr.campaign_id = c.campaign_id WHERE cr.conversion_rate > 0.5
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE last_activity_date < '2022-10-01' ORDER BY username
SELECT ad_title, ad_type FROM ads
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT ad_title, ad_cost FROM ads ORDER BY ad_cost DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT ad_title, ad_cost FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'Banner'
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT ad_title, ad_type, ad_cost FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'banner' ORDER BY ad_cost ASC;
SELECT ad_group_name, campaign_name FROM ad_groups INNER JOIN campaigns ON ad_groups.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT ad_title, ad_cost, revenue FROM ads INNER JOIN conversions ON ads.ad_id = conversions.ad_id WHERE revenue > 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaign_data
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_data
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM channel_data
SELECT device_type, COUNT(device_id) AS num_devices FROM device_data GROUP BY device_type
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaign_data WHERE budget > 5000
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaign_data WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM conversion_data ORDER BY conversion_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM campaign_data JOIN conversion_data ON campaign_data.campaign_id = conversion_data.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT DISTINCT channel_name FROM channel_data WHERE channel_type = 'Social Media';
